channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 01:51 Alarm response in Vinnytsia region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 01:51 Alarm response in Vinnytsia region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Винницка_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 23:19 Alarm repulse in Kharkiv Oblast. item.title: 🔴 22:44 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 22:44 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter!
